content: the rosewood scarf features a fisherman s rib stitch body with alternating cables making for a wonderfully textured reversible scarf the pattern includes written charted and video instruction pattern details yarn 825 yds/755 m 4 skeins handmade home fibers classic worsted 100% superwash merino wool shown in rosewood needles us 8/5 0 mm *or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle for weaving in ends locking stitch marker gauge 16 sts and 26 row = 4 in/10 cm in fisherman s rib unblocked sizes one finished dimensions 8 in 20 cm x 84 in 213 cm
